tags: imma reblog this with commentary in a second but I wanted the whole conversation as is as a post on my blog
'he'll outlive you right there' I am straight up gonna cry
summary: “How long do you live?”  “If I complete my journey, it could be upward of a thousand years.”  “How long do you think I live?” ...
body:
“How long do you live?”

“If I complete my journey, it could be upward of a thousand years.”

“How long do you think I live?”

“Less than a hundred? If you’re lucky.”

“No.”

“How long?”

“I am Percival Fredrickstein von Musel Klossowoski de Rolo III. My ancestry dates back for thousands of years and will continue for thousands more. Unless Whitestone falls. I live as long as Whitestone lives. This place is… the human soul. This is what we have built with our tiny moments. To lose a place like this - we don’t feel it immediately, but it would ruin everyone. In small ways.”

“Not all of us are lucky enough to have a lineage in a name.”

“Not all of us are lucky enough to have a lineage in a lifespan.”

To lose a place like this - we don’t feel it immediately, but it would ruin everyone. In small ways.”

To lose a place like this - we don’t feel it immediately, but it would ruin everyone. In small ways.”

tags: dont spoil future episodes for me
i know theres rabid fans out there
but im going to stand my ground and defend my right to have an opinion
summary: I have been binge-watching Critical Role from the beginning
body:
I have been binge-watching Critical Role from the beginning

Yep. For the past two weeks. I’m now at episode 53.

I love Matt Mercer as a DM, I’ve learned SO MUCH. So excited to DM on my own no too far in the future!

My favorite player is probably Taliesin and Percy is also probably my favorite character. Not only because of shadow smoke monsters, but hey; shadow smoke monsters is a fave of mine. But yeah, just generally really enjoy the way he plays his character.

Vex, Grog and Scanlan are great, i love them all for different reasons. Vax I liked more before the first Briarwood encounter, he’s been so gloomy and brooding since then.

Keyleth… I sometimes like her, i usually enjoy her interactions with Percy very much, I often think she’s great fun, but I can’t grasp her character. Is she a naive, awkward druid or a well-spoken and slightly arrogant princess type? It frustrates me that she’s so wildly inconsistent.

Also all Vax-Keyleth romantic interactions are making me cringe. They’re just, so, awkward. There’s nothing natural about it. Percy and Vex have such a great chemistry, they’re fun and nice and natural, i get how that could happen. (Which someone sadly spoiled for me… So no future spoilers!!)

But yeah. Regardless of what I feel about the characters at times, I have great fun watching this. It’s great!

blog.description: This is where I can express my thoughts and feelings, being able to explore around in my dreams ~~

summary:
Jester: I am so sorry you guys. We are actually a lot cooler than this!
Beau: Are you actually?
Jester: ... 
Jester: No. No we...
body:
Jester: I am so sorry you guys. We are actually a lot cooler than this!
Beau: Are you actually?
Jester: ... 
Jester: No. No we are not.

dialogue.label: Jester:
dialogue.phrase: I am so sorry you guys. We are actually a lot cooler than this!

Socket's D&D tumblr, for adventure chronicling, player character art, and panicked screaming over the DM's newest reveal. (And D&D-related reblogs, probably.)
